This website aims to provide a brief but comprehensive view into the foreign policy of Germany. Sections include:

* History of German foreign policy since 1945
* The stated foreign policy goals of the German government
* The structure of the military and defense regime 
* Major political party views on foreign policy
* Some current foreign policy issues
